General.Name: Shandong Ruifeng Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Ruifeng Chemical Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells PVC additives in China. Its products include acrylic impact modifiers, acrylic processing aids, MBS impact modifiers, chlorinated polyethylene, PC/ABS impact modifiers, ABS high rubber powders, ASA high rubber powders, epichlorohydrin, poly butylene adipate-co-terephthalate, PVC processing aids, and PVC lubricating processing aids. The company also exports its products to Europe; the Americas; and South, Southeast, and East Asia. Shandong Ruifeng Chemical Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.
